xt:extension.xt:name: ImposeOptions

div.p: This plugin imposes options and layouts to the user who installs it.
On the first start the plugin will contribute the "New file" templates which are present in the "templates" folder to the Oxygen's "New file" templates.
If the plugin finds a file called "options.xml" in its folder, it will apply these options over the ones currently used by the application.
If the plugin finds a layout file called "application.layout" in its folder, it will apply the layout as a fixed layout when the application is started.
